titleStmt.title: M. B. Griffith, Joseph Hendrickson and Elias Byley, Affidavit
CWG2669

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

Early Access

body.p:
Voters
Names W. Waller
Thomas Hodges 1
L. K. Park 2

W. C. Dawes 15
T. J. Green 16
W. Liles 17
Jonathan Byley 18
Phillip Stivers 19
William Byley 20
D. H. Byley 21
Joseph Griffith 22
Levi McGrigor 23
Henry Smith 24
Joseph Hendrickson 26
Elias Byley 27
M. B. Griffith Clerk

at an Election held in Marshall Conty K.Y. in the fourth District ^on the first mond in Feby 1862.^ at the house of Joseph Hendrickson for a member to the Legislator of Kentucky the vote stands thus ^for^ W. Waller 32

Joseph Hendrickson
Elias Byerly
M. B. Griffith C C
Judges

We M B Griffith, Joseph Hendrickson and Elias Byley loyal citizens of Marshall County and residents in district No 4 meet at the house of Joseph Hendrickson on the 3rd day of February 1862 and the hour of 9 Oclock having arrived and the County Judge & Sheriff failing to appoint officers to Hold an election as required by law for representative for Marshall County
did proceed and hold said election and the Vote stood for W Waller 32 he being the only candidate Sworn under our hands this 3rd day of February 1862

Joseph Hendrickson
Elias Byerly
M B Griffith

I do certify that the above named officers are loyal citizens and that they personally appeared before me the undersigned a Justice of the peace ^for Marshall County Ky^ and ware sworn and subscribed their names to the above certificate Given under my hand this 3rd Feby 1862
A. Johnson J. P. M. C.

We M. B. Griffith, Joseph Hendrickson and Elias Birely do certify that the officers to whome this return should have been made are disloyal we therefore return the same to the Govenor Secretary of State and Attorney General Given under our hands this Feby 3rd 1862

Joseph Hendrickson
Elias Byerly
M. B Griffith
Sworn to and subscribed to before me this 3rd day of February 1862
A, Johnson J. P. M. C
